filter_rules.description: Filter contacts by con_id and valid contact type. Array order determines priority (first = highest).
Filter address elements by valid address type
Filter employment elements by valid employment_type

mappings.expression: CASE WHEN app_entry_date IS NOT EMPTY THEN app_entry_date ELSE app_receive_date END

mappings.description: Product line enum mapping; all RL apps map empty->602 via enum_mappings.

mappings.expression: CASE WHEN dlr_num_marine IS NOT EMPTY THEN dlr_num_marine WHEN dlr_num_rv IS NOT EMPTY THEN dlr_num_rv WHEN dlr_num_or IS NOT EMPTY THEN dlr_num_or WHEN dlr_num_ht IS NOT EMPTY THEN dlr_num_ht WHEN dlr_num_trailer IS NOT EMPTY THEN dlr_num_trailer WHEN dlr_num_mc IS NOT EMPTY THEN dlr_num_mc END
CASE WHEN (months_at_residence > 0 OR years_at_residence > 0) THEN (months_at_residence + (years_at_residence * 12)) END
CASE WHEN (months_at_job > 0 OR years_at_job > 0) THEN (months_at_job + (years_at_job * 12)) END
CASE WHEN salary_basis_type_code = 'ANNUM' THEN (salary / 12) WHEN salary_basis_type_code = 'MONTH' THEN salary ELSE salary END
CASE WHEN MRV_lead_indicator_p = 'MRV' THEN 640 WHEN MRV_lead_indicator_p = 'Vantage' THEN 641 END
CASE WHEN MRV_lead_indicator_s = 'MRV' THEN 640 WHEN MRV_lead_indicator_s = 'Vantage' THEN 641 END
CASE WHEN MRVP_Decline_Code_1 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'MRV1' END
CASE WHEN MRVP_Decline_Code_2 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'MRV1' END
CASE WHEN MRVP_Decline_Code_3 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'MRV1' END
CASE WHEN MRVP_Decline_Code_4 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'MRV1' END
CASE WHEN MRVS_Decline_Code_1 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'MRV1' END
CASE WHEN MRVS_Decline_Code_2 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'MRV1' END
CASE WHEN MRVS_Decline_Code_3 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'MRV1' END
CASE WHEN MRVS_Decline_Code_4 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'MRV1' END

CASE WHEN IL_app_decision_info.regb_closed_days_num > 0 AND IL_application.app_entry_date IS NOT EMPTY THEN DATEADD(day, IL_app_decision_info.regb_closed_days_num, IL_application.app_entry_date) WHEN IL_app_decision_info.regb_closed_days_num > 0 AND IL_application.app_receive_date IS NOT EMPTY THEN DATEADD(day, IL_app_decision_info.regb_closed_days_num, IL_application.app_receive_date) END
CASE WHEN Vantage4P_decline_code1 IS NOT EMPTY AND IL_application.app_entry_date > '2020-01-01' THEN 'V4' WHEN score_factor_code_pr_1 IS NOT EMPTY THEN score_factor_code_pr_1 END
CASE WHEN Vantage4P_decline_code2 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END
CASE WHEN Vantage4P_decline_code3 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END
CASE WHEN Vantage4P_decline_code4 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END
CASE WHEN Vantage4P_decline_code5 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END
CASE WHEN Vantage4S_decline_code1 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END
CASE WHEN Vantage4S_decline_code2 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END
CASE WHEN Vantage4S_decline_code3 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END
CASE WHEN Vantage4S_decline_code4 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END
CASE WHEN Vantage4S_decline_code5 IS NOT EMPTY THEN 'V4' END

CASE WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'MARINE' THEN 412 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'RV' THEN 419 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'HT' THEN 415 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'UT' THEN 421 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'MC' THEN 416 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' AND IL_application.sub_type_code = 'ATV' THEN 410 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' AND IL_application.sub_type_code = 'UTV' THEN 422 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' AND IL_application.sub_type_code = 'PWC' THEN 418 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' AND IL_application.sub_type_code = 'SNOWMOBILE' THEN 420 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code IS NOT EMPTY THEN 423 ELSE 423 END

CASE WHEN IL_collateral.coll2_HP_Marine > '0' THEN 413 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'MARINE' AND IL_collateral.coll2_value IS NOT EMPTY THEN 413 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'MARINE' AND IL_collateral.make IS NOT EMPTY THEN 413 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' AND IL_application.sub_type_code = 'ATV' THEN 410 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' AND IL_application.sub_type_code = 'UTV' THEN 422 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' AND IL_application.sub_type_code = 'PWC' THEN 418 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' AND IL_application.sub_type_code = 'SNOWMOBILE' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll2_value IS NOT EMPTY THEN 423 ELSE 423 END

CASE WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%BT%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%BEAR%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%BOATMATE%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%BACKTRACK%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%TRAILSTAR%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%MAGIC TILT%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%MARINE MASTER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%SHORELANDER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%SHORELANDR%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%EZ LOADER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%KARAVAN%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%MCCLAIN%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%ESCORT%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%ROAD RUNNER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%LOAD RITE%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%LOADRITE%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%MAGIC LOADER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%MALIBU%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%ZIEMAN%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%TRACKER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%DIAMOND CITY%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%RANGER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%WESCO%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%TRAILER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_model LIKE '%TRAILER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_HP_Marine > '0' THEN 413 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%MERCURY%' THEN 413 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%YAMAHA%' THEN 413 WHEN IL_collateral.coll3_make LIKE '%MERCRUISER%' THEN 413 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code IS NOT EMPTY AND IL_collateral.coll3_value IS NOT EMPTY THEN 423 ELSE 423 END

CASE WHEN IL_collateral.coll4_make LIKE '%MERCURY%' THEN 413 WHEN IL_collateral.coll4_make LIKE '%YAMAHA%' THEN 413 WHEN IL_collateral.coll4_make LIKE '%MERCRUISER%' THEN 413 WHEN IL_collateral.coll4_model LIKE '%TRAILER%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_collateral.coll4_make LIKE '%MAGIC TILT%' THEN 420 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'MARINE' THEN 417 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code = 'OR' THEN 417 WHEN IL_application.app_type_code IS NOT EMPTY AND IL_collateral.coll4_value IS NOT EMPTY THEN 423 ELSE 423 END

CASE WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%WENDY%' OR chk_requested_by LIKE '%DOTSON%' THEN 'WENDY.DOTSON@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%POTEZ%' THEN 'ALYSSA.RAPOTEZ@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%ANGIE%' THEN 'ANGIE.HAYS@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%ASHLEY%' OR chk_requested_by LIKE '%HAASE%' THEN 'ASHLEY.HAASE@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%SIPLINGER%' THEN 'BRIANN.SIPLINGER@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%CHARISSA%' THEN 'CHARISSA.GREEN@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%CINDY%' OR chk_requested_by LIKE '%BEASON%' THEN 'CINDY.BEASON@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%DIANA%' OR chk_requested_by LIKE '%JOHNS%' THEN 'DIANA.JOHNS@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%JONA%' THEN 'JONA.KELLER@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%KATIE%' OR chk_requested_by LIKE '%VANCE%' THEN 'KATIE.VANCE@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%KARISSA%' THEN 'KARISSA.WHITE@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%KRISTY%' THEN 'KRISTY.LOTTE@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%MARIA%' OR chk_requested_by LIKE '%CAMPOS%' THEN 'MARIA.CAMPOS@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%HDYE%' OR chk_requested_by LIKE '%HYDE%' THEN 'MIA.HYDE@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%PRESTON%' THEN 'MICHELLE.PRESTON@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE 'PAM%' OR chk_requested_by LIKE '%MIETCHEN%' THEN 'PAM.MIETCHEN@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%BITTLE%' THEN 'SHERRY.BITTLE@MERRICKBANK.COM' WHEN chk_requested_by LIKE '%CARTER%' THEN 'SHAUNA.CARTER@MERRICKBANK.COM' END
